title: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed Collection
notes:
As with regular Wine the configurator does not run, to change settings you must add a folder called "SART" in steamapps/compatdata/212480/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My Documents/. Add a file called "settings.xml" into the SART folder. Template for settings.xml from WineHQ: https://bugs.winehq.org/attachment.cgi?id=45388
Edit settings.xml to your liking.
Alt-tabbing results in being unable to return to the game
Game otherwise works fine

title: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed Collection
notes: Can't run config tool (Launcher.exe). Workaround: Run it in a 32-bit prefix, configure game, move newly created SART folder from user home to ~/.steam/steam/steamapps/compatdata/212480/pfx/drive_c/users/steamuser/My\ Documents (if My Documents folder doesn't exist, create it, and IT MUST BE CALLED "My Documents" REGARDLESS OF SYSTEM LANGUAGE). Your settings should now work when running the game.
